Articles.Content:
Hey everyone !

I currently play KSP version 1.11.

I am assembling a space station and I have noticed that when I use physical warp the station I am trying to build moves, and a lot !

Here's a video : https://imgur.com/a/2ahegvN

It's totally game killing, have you experience such issue and is it easy to solve ? Thanks !

2 hours ago, maxander42 said:

Here's a video : https://imgur.com/a/2ahegvN

That is so super weird,  1.11 is proving to be a tough one for sure.

Maybe this will help? https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/26908

But this is for Kerbals but i read other posts that have weird acceleration issues.

Can i ask why use physical warp and not the ''normal'' one?

Is there something active going on at that moment?

You don't seem to have many mods maybe put them in a list, i am so curious on what's going on there.

Edited December 29, 2020 by Boyster

6 hours ago, maxander42 said:

I am assembling a space station and I have noticed that when I use physical warp the station I am trying to build moves, and a lot !

Yeah, I got that, too. As far as I can remember, it's been in every version I played (probably since 1.4, I can't remember :)), so it's not a new thing in 1.11. Oddly enough, it doesn't appear to happen all the time or with every vessel.

6 hours ago, maxander42 said:

is it easy to solve ?

I don't know any solution to it, I'm afraid. Time-warp often does some weird things. It often moves back to the original position after warping, so I just warp to get close and then dock as if nothing happened.
